Pre-Game Insights: West Indies is favored to win this match given their experienced lineup and strong recent performances.
Their powerful batting and effective bowling attack are expected to outmatch Papua New Guinea.
However, PNG's determination and ability to spring surprises could make this an interesting contest.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup 2024 will see West Indies face off against Papua New Guinea on Sunday, 2nd June 2024, at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
Both teams have not faced each other in a T20I game yet.
The toss of the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 match between West Indies and Papua New Guinea will take place at 07:30 pm IST.
According to Dafabet, West Indies are the favorites to win the T20 World Cup 2024 match against Papua New Guinea.
